scripts.test:watch: npx -y nodemon --watch grammar.js --watch src/scanner.c --exec "pnpm run test"
scripts.build:watch: npx -y nodemon --watch grammar.js --watch src/scanner.c --exec "pnpm run build"
scripts.build:wasm: pnpm run build && npx -y tree-sitter-cli@0.20.6 build-wasm --docker
scripts.playground: pnpm run build:wasm && npx -y tree-sitter-cli@0.20.6 playground
scripts.playground:quiet: pnpm run build:wasm && npx -y tree-sitter-cli@0.20.6 playground -q
scripts.playground:watch: npx -y nodemon --watch grammar.js --watch src/scanner.c --exec "pnpm run playground:quiet"
